name: Arrows on Dead
description:
In this postapocalyptic game you are a fierce survivor that made his barricade on the Golden Gate Bridge of San Francisco.

Improve your aiming skills defending yourself from waves of zombies and monsters, using a bow and arrow!
Earn money killing enemies and spend them in the market buying and upgrading weapons.

If you are stuck, replay old levels to earn money to buy upgrades.

Please note that this is an ALPHA VERSION, so the code, some graphics and audio effects must be refined.
The full version will be available in a few months, and it will be not free.. new levels, weapons and monsters will be added!

Meanwhile you can try some levels on this demo to get an idea of the game.. 
if you like it and you want to support me improving the development, you can make a little donation, i will really appreciate it :)

I'm working on this game in the free time, so I apologize for the lack of the story, because I'm focusing only on the gameplay, to finish it as soon as possible.

Any advice or comments will be appreciated!

Hope you enjoy the game!

FEATURES:

  • 15 levels
  • two weapons available
  • two types of enemies
  • Editable settings ( sound and music volume, fullscreen on / off)
  • musics and most of the graphics self-made ( recommended use of headphones! )
  • more of theese on the future full version

CONTROLS:

  • UP/ DOWN arrows  =  aim
  • SPACEBAR =shoot / hold to charge the shoot - release to shoot
  • P = pause / resume
  • Q/W = change weapon

Made with Monogame Framework
